name: PrimaryCare-Condition-RelationshipType
description: A set of codes specifying the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition.

concept.definition: This condition is combined/merged with the target condition to form a single logical condition.
This condition is part of a group that includes the target condition as a member of the group.
This condition replaces a previous condition (i.e. a revised diagnosis). The target condition is now obsolete.
This condition has evolved from the target condition.
